name: Kanopy
description: Free streaming of films and documentaries for library cardholders
fullDescription: Kanopy is a free video streaming service for library cardholders offering thoughtful entertainment including films, documentaries, and educational content.
whatTheyOffer:
- Thousands of films and documentaries
- Criterion Collection films
- Independent and international cinema
- Great Courses educational videos
- PBS documentaries
- Monthly credit system (varies by library)
howToGetIt:
1. Check if your library offers Kanopy
2. Visit kanopy.com and find your library
3. Sign up with your library card
4. Stream on web, mobile, or TV apps
5. Credits refresh monthly
